name: STAR Method
usage: Interview responses, cover letters, achievement descriptions
example: When [situation], I was tasked with [task]. I [action], which resulted in [quantified outcome].

name: Problem Agitate Solve
structure: Identify Problem → Explain Impact → Present Solution
usage: Cover letters, value propositions, LinkedIn messages
example: I understand [company] is facing [challenge]. This can impact [consequences]. My experience in [relevant area] can help by [solution].

name: AIDA Model
usage: All outreach messages, email subjects, connection requests
example: [Attention-grabbing opening]. [Interesting detail]. [Why they should care]. [Specific next step].

name: Before After Bridge
structure: Current State → Desired State → How to Get There
usage: Networking messages, interview answers, cover letters
example: Currently, [problem]. Imagine instead [ideal scenario]. With my background in [expertise], I can help bridge that gap by [specific approach].
